annotations:
To: Chartering desk
Fm: SOL / Ms.Lin
Re: SOL Shipping Cargo Order and Open Tonnage:
Dear All, good day!
Pls pps for our flwg:
- Cargo Order -
AA)
A/C SOL SHIPPING
- DWT 18-22K, gless vsl ok.
- SLAB / BAG CGO
- DURATION ABT 25 DAYS WOG
- LAYCAN: 26-29TH/AUG/2024
- DELY BAHAODOPI (can take vsl Surabaya-Davao range)
- REDLY CHINA INT NINGDE
- ADD 3.75%
BB)
A/C SOL SHIPPING
- DWT 28K, old age ok
- BULK COKE / BAG CGO
- DURATION ABT 20 DAYS WOG
- LAYCAN: 25-28TH/AUG/2024
- DELY TIANJIN
- REDLY SULAWESI INT MOROWALI
- ADD 3.75%
(can try 2LL)
CC)
A/C SOL SHIPPING
- DWT 35-55K
- STEEL  / EQUIPMENT / VEHICLES
- on deck+hatch cover loading
- DURATION ABT 25 DAYS WOG
- LAYCAN: 10TH-20TH/SEP/2024
- DELY CJK
- REDLY MERAK-JKT RANGE
- ADD 3.75%
- Open Tonnage -
M.V. WAN HONG - 28K DWT, OPEN GENERAL SANTOS-DAVAO RANGE, 02ND/SEP/2024
BOD about 410/100 mtDirection:  Far East - South East Asia range.
NAME: WAN HONG
IMO NR: 9260304     FLAG: PANAMA
BLT: 2002       TYPE: SINGLE DECKER SELF-TRIMMING LOG/BULK CARRIER
CLASS: BV
DWT: 28,461MT
DRAFT:9.778M
LOA/BM/DEPTH: 169.26/27.2/13.6 M
GT/NT: 16,978/10,498 MT
5HO/5HA
G/B CAPA: 37523/35763 M3
HOLDWISE CAPA (CBM): GRAIN        BALE
NO.1   5320         5016
NO.2   8236         7840
NO.3   8261         7883
NO.4   8298         7883
NO.5   7408         7141
GEAR: 4 X 28MT  DECK CRANE
HA COVERS TYPE: FOLDING TYPE STEEL DOUBLE SKIN HATCH COVER HYDRAULICALLY OPERATED
HATCHES SIZE IN METERS:
NO.1 : 13.6X 16.00M
NO.2-5 : 19.20 X 17.60M
TANK TOP STRENGTH:11.285 MT/SQM
HATCH COVER 3.3/SQM;
DECK-4.1MT/SQM
SPEED & DAILY BUNKER CONSUMPTION AT SEA UNDER GOOD WEATHER:
BALLAST: ABT 13.0KTS ON ABT 17 MT IFO 380CST PLUS ABT 0.1MT LSMGO.
LADDEN:  ABT 11.5KTS ON ABT 17 MT IFO 380CST PLUS ABT 0.1MT LSMGO.
DAILY CONSUMPTION IN PORT:
IDLE: ABT 1.3MT 380CST +0.1MT LSMGO
WORKING USE SHIP CRANE: ABT 2.4 MT 380CST +0.1MT LSMGO
ADA WOG.
Tks n b.rgds
Lin 林敏
南海航运有限公司
